page.syntax: File_List as C = ui_get_files_multiple([C title [,C default_directory [,C file_filter [,C default_file_list ]]]])

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Select Multiple Files". The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: file_filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = "*.*". A filter that selects files.

argument.name: default_file_list
argument.description: Optional. No default. A list of pre-selected file.

page.description: Select multiple files. Returns a CRLF delimited list.
page.discussion: The UI_GET_FILES_MULTIPLE() function prompts for filenames. Allows user to select multiple filenames.
